text: @realDonaldTrump Reading about the giveaway to millionaires in the coronavirus bill and the cozy deal between DeSantis, Fox, and Linda McMahon, one has to be impressed by the seamless way Trump has knit together populist trashing of the public weal and oligarchic plundering of the public fisc.
